activities: Column Technologies, Inc. is a processor of data that is placed in our systems by our customers. Any information received is provided by and consumed by our customers exclusively. Column does not interact with our customer data in any way to the exclusion of what is strictly required to be able to provide the service and to insure stability of the service.

personaldata: Online customer transaction data defined by end user customers.
